main event: A luminous grayish disc was observed hovering between clouds by the U.S. Coast Guard in the Atlantic Ocean on September 30, 1952.
interesting points: The disc appeared in a break between clouds at about 5000 feet altitude and was estimated to be 5-600 feet in diameter,The object hovered for a few minutes before moving slowly and then rapidly increased its speed to approximately 600 mph,Members of the ship's crew initially thought it was a 'flying saucer',The phenomenon was later identified as an aircraft above the clouds operating landing lights,Had the aircraft not been identified, witnesses would have believed it to be a flying saucer.
witness description: members of the U.S. Coast Guard crew aboard the ship Taney
